description: This file is an ESLint configuration script written in JavaScript, setting up ESLint to lint files including Svelte components, with various plugins and configurations imported and combined.

methods.name: ts.config
methods.description: Function from typescript-eslint to generate ESLint configurations based on provided options.

methods.name: includeIgnoreFile
methods.description: Function from @eslint/compat to generate ignore patterns based on .gitignore.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Utility from node:url to convert a file URL into a filesystem path.
